docs.text: This is a notebook of lectures of CS61A A course of abstraction Lecture 2 1.Q: analyse what is the output of the block f = min f = max g,h =min, max max=g max(f(2,g(h(1,5),3)),4) 2. 从终端调用python mul/add函数/pi值： from operator import mul,add from math import pi 3. 执行顺序： a = 1 b = 2 b,a = a + b, b Output: a=2,b=3 ~~真的有人这样子写代码吗~~ Rules: Evaluate all expressions to the right of= from left to right. Bind all names to the left of = to the resulting values in the current frame 4. How to define a function: def <name>(<formal parameters>): return <return expression> Plus: 如果在括号内直接给变量赋值，则为”默认值“，即若无特殊声明，默认为默认值。 Lecture 2 1.None Indicateds that Nothing is Returned The special value None represents nothing in Python A function that does not explicitly return a value will return None Careful : None is not displayed by the interpreter as the value of an expression. Q: analyse what is the output of the following code print(print(1),print(2)) A 1 2 None None 2. python交互界面： 例如以下代码： from operator import floordiv,mod def divide_exact(n,d): return floordiv(n,d),mod(n,d) 如果要查看q,r的值，我们通常会采取print函数，但是！~~不仅麻烦还不够帅~~！所以这里就采用交互模式 python3 -i pytest.py >>> q 201 >>> r 3 That's what we see from Terminal 交互模式！
docs.title: CS61A
This is a notebook of lectures of CS61A

docs.text: 1.Q: analyse what is the output of the block f = min f = max g,h =min, max max=g max(f(2,g(h(1,5),3)),4) 2. 从终端调用python mul/add函数/pi值： from operator import mul,add from math import pi 3. 执行顺序： a = 1 b = 2 b,a = a + b, b Output: a=2,b=3 ~~真的有人这样子写代码吗~~ Rules: Evaluate all expressions to the right of= from left to right. Bind all names to the left of = to the resulting values in the current frame 4. How to define a function: def <name>(<formal parameters>): return <return expression> Plus: 如果在括号内直接给变量赋值，则为”默认值“，即若无特殊声明，默认为默认值。
docs.title: Lecture 2

docs.text: 1.None Indicateds that Nothing is Returned The special value None represents nothing in Python A function that does not explicitly return a value will return None Careful : None is not displayed by the interpreter as the value of an expression. Q: analyse what is the output of the following code print(print(1),print(2)) A 1 2 None None 2. python交互界面： 例如以下代码： from operator import floordiv,mod def divide_exact(n,d): return floordiv(n,d),mod(n,d) 如果要查看q,r的值，我们通常会采取print函数，但是！~~不仅麻烦还不够帅~~！所以这里就采用交互模式 python3 -i pytest.py >>> q 201 >>> r 3 That's what we see from Terminal 交互模式！
docs.title: Lecture 2

docs.text: 英语学习小笔记本 😋🦉 9.27 payroll 工资（单）/工薪系统 ascribe 归咎于 malice 恶意：out of ~出于～；fell no malice against sb 怨恨sb resolute 坚决的 advent of sth出现/到来 resign 辞职😭 crunch n/v 嘎吱声/关键时刻cash ～：现金危机/验证（数据）：～ the numbers neutrality 中立 declare its ～ carve in stone 一成不变 repressive （政府/制度/行为）镇压的/专制的；压抑的 in a~ sort of voice 耐着性子地说 heroic 大胆的/英勇的 No heroic in Namibia 在纳米比亚别逞英雄 discord 混乱/冲突/纷争 war and ～ sequential 顺序的 ～numbers 序号 ；sequence 序列/数列 yield 获得/取得/屈服 :yield to their demands屈服于他们的要求；（交通让路）：～ to oncoming traffic remain a bible for sb 被sb奉为圣经 marvelou 奇妙的（令人赞叹） workfoce 劳动力/全体职员 cut the ～ 裁员😭 deductive 推理的/推断的 （～skills） permeation （物理/化学/文化）深透 execute 执行/实行（代码）😊 9.28 schooling [n/v]学校教育，教育，培养：begin one's ~ : 开始上学have no ～ 没上过学； legislative 立法的 ～ branch ：立法部门 coalition 联盟 discrepancy [n]差异 （resolve/explain/address）（significant/minor）～between/in··· faction [n]分裂的小团体/派系 the warring ~：交战双方；=fact+fiction：纪实小说 fluid [a]（液体）流动性的，灵活易变，（语言/动作）流畅的; n 气体/液体，体液 cereal [n]谷物（制品），麦片，[a]谷物的 renovate 翻修，整修（建筑物） preliminary [a]初步的 [n]（正式活动之前）初步行动，准备 ～investigation（初步调查）～examination（预备考试） beckon to 向某人招呼 She beckoned to me from across the room； belcon for 带有邀请/召唤意思（强调目的/原因）The waiter beckoned for us to follow him to our table；也可以不加介词：～ him over to her:示意他到身边来 countdown 倒计时 flight ：层（一段楼梯）ten ～ of stairs；飞行；航班；逃跑：make a ~ from prison/they ~ from the country；一系列/一排：a flight of geese(大雁);A tolerant attitude toward your flight of lunacy(大人不记小人过) Remove : 更强调物理上的移除，可能并不意味着永久消失。 E.g. remove the book from the shelf Eliminate : 表示彻底地消除或排除，通常是永久性的，尤其是在表示消除错误、威胁、竞争对手等时，强调结果的彻底性。 E.g. We must eliminate the source of the problem. Eradicate 用于根除重大问题或长期存在的坏现象，强调消除根源。 E.g. The government is working to eradicate poverty in the region. Eliminate 则可能是去除某个因素，语气相对轻一些 E.g. We need to eliminate unnecessary expenses(开支). abolish 通常用来指代废除某个制度、法律或习俗，意思是正式取消某项规定或做法，常与体制或政策相关。 E.g. Slavery was abolished in the United States in the 19th century. assume 假设，认为，预想 colonize 开拓，征服（新地区），殖民 connotation 含义/涵义：negative ～，have a different ~ in；影响 incidence 事件发生的频率/发病率：The incidence of flu cases increased during the winter months；发生：The incidence of road accidents； incidence rate 发生率 explicitly 清楚地（表达某事）
docs.title: Every week English
